titles.title: To amend title 40, United States Code, to designate certain counties and a city as part of the Appalachian region.
To amend title 40, United States Code, to designate certain counties and a city as part of the Appalachian region.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Economic Development, Public Buildings and Emergency Management.

committee.name: House Transportation and Infrastructure
committee.subcommittee: Economic Development, Public Buildings, and Emergency Management

bill.summary: Amends Federal provisions concerning Appalachian regional development to revise the definition of "Appalachian region" to include: (1) cities located within listed counties; and (2) Franklin, Henry, and Patrick Counties and the City of Martinsville in Virginia.
